consentText: This site collects data through forms. By continuing, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
dataCollectionExplanation: We collect personal data to enhance your experience on our site. The data provided through forms is used for user support, traffic analysis, and when applicable, personalized marketing. We do not share your data with third parties without your explicit consent. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

HOME.TITLE: Our solutions
HOME.DESCRIPTION: We develop and offer solutions for Cooperatives, General Warehouses, Coffee Merchants, and Brokers seeking modernization and operational efficiency, providing a smarter and more competitive management in an ever-evolving market.
HOME.SOLUCOES_DE_GESTAO_COMPLETAS: Complete and integrated management solutions developed by specialists in the sector
HOME.SISTEMA_COMPLETO_GERENCIAMENTO_ARMAZEN: Complete system for managing warehouse processes
HOME.CONECTADOS_COM_CAFE: CONNECTED WITH COFFEE SYNCHRONIZED BY TECHNOLOGY
HOME.CRIAR_O_FUTURO: Let's create the future of your business together.
HOME.WMS: Warehouse management system for local servers.
HOME.SISTEMA_GESTAO_CAFE: Web system for managing coffee marketing.
HOME.APLICATIVO_COOPERATIVAS: App for Cooperatives. Access for Members, Technicians, and Agronomists.
HOME.PREVISAO_SAFRA: Harvest forecast, plot registration, and more
HOME.AUTOMACAO_MAQUINARIO_DESCRICAO: With machinery automation, it is possible to integrate equipment into the AgroSync Coffee WMS system for efficient management.
HOME.ACOMPANHAR_RELATORIOS: Track detailed reports and graphs on production, activity times, maintenance, and failures, ensuring maximum efficiency and reduced operating costs.
HOME.IMPLANTACAO_RFID: Implementation of RFID readers and antennas on forklifts, ensuring tracking of BAG movements in the warehouse.
HOME.FABRICACAO_TAGS_RFID: Manufacture of RFID tags for BAGs and machinery. Tracking stored batches, reliability, and more security in warehouse processes.
HOME.TUDO_COMECOU: It all started with an RFID tag and the desire to track coffee paths within the warehouse. It was the gateway to a world of innovation opportunities in the coffee production chain.
HOME.AO_LONGO_DOS_ANOS: Over the years, we have built strong ties with the coffee community in southern Minas, from whom we have learned and evolved, developing carefully crafted technological solutions to ensure integrated and efficient management of the processes that take coffee from the farm to the most demanding consumers around the world.
HOME.MISSAO_DESCRICAO: Apply information technology in the constant pursuit of process innovation, ensuring efficiency and security, generating positive results.
HOME.REFERENCIA_GERENCIAMENTO: Be a national reference in warehouse inventory management and control, using radio frequency identification solutions.
HOME.VALORIZACAO_COLABORADORES: Valuation and commitment of our employees;
HOME.ETICA_TRANSPARENCIA: Ethics, transparency, and honesty in business;
